title: Kog/Lulu interactions need some nerfs.
body: A 2 item kog has as much damage as a 100% crit xayah with ardent censor lulu attached. This is kinda ridiculous. Had a game we were ahead in, and he got his second item and just walked up to our entire team pressed w with lulu e and everyone just phased out of the game and started an adventure with a gray screen. How is this even cool? How to counter kog, be a fed assassin and end before 30? That can't be an intended gameplay mechanic.
